ESORICS 2021 will be held as a virtual event on October 04–08, 2021. For further details, please refer to ESORICS 2021 main page

About the Workshop

According to the new EU’s Cybersecurity Strategy for the Digital Decade, in the next years will be critical to build operational capacity to prevent, deter and respond to cyber threats, which highlighted the need to boost the development of state-of-the-art cyber defence technologies. This urgent action together with the emergence of innovative concepts in the field of secure communications notably at the network edge evidences a necessary coordination and synchronization to balance common interests and dual use endeavours. In this context, nowadays most of the EU cybersecurity and cyber defence forums are not cross-sectorial and therefore it is difficult to find dual-use related discussions to engage the civil and military research community. The 1st International Workshop on Cyber Defence Technologies and Secure Communications at the Network Edge (CDT & SECOMANE) aims to close this gap by opening a forum were both communities exchange information for a mutual benefit. Hence the ESORICS community could openly contribute and participate at cyber defence and secure network dual-use related discussions contributing to enrich and enlarge participation.

For further details, refer to the CfP and Program
